body_html:
Hi @MInner. Thanks for your report.

I think it would be useful for me to see the full stdout and stderr for the run that causes the segfault. That should include all the ordinary debug output you mentioned (loading cuda .so files, etc.).

I'd also like to see the full backtrace when you run it under gdb. You should be able to get that by using the gdb 'backtrace' command.

body:
Hi @MInner. Thanks for your report.

I think it would be useful for me to see the full stdout and stderr for the run that causes the segfault. That should include all the ordinary debug output you mentioned (loading cuda .so files, etc.).

I'd also like to see the full backtrace when you run it under gdb. You should be able to get that by using the gdb 'backtrace' command.
